column4: hello all, i've been trying to install php with libcurl, however halfway it prompts that i do not have libxml2 installed, however when i searched for libxml2 in the package manager, it shows up!

hello all, i've been trying to install php with libcurl, however when i ./configured it halfway it prompts that i do not have libxml2 installed, however when i searched for libxml2 in the package manager, it shows up!
